title: Datastore

next.title: Fare Trends
next.description: Pricing for airlines is one of the most volatile and dynamic metric in the travel industry. No wonder, it can drive potential customer really anxious before buying an airline ticket. Thus there is a great need for proper fare analytics and fare trend visualisations for better user experience and hassle free booking.

prev.title: Smart Fare calendar system
prev.description:
Design a simple fare calendar system in order to cluster different price range in respective air route to get a better understanding to price variation throughout the year. Instead of having just minimum, maximum and median airfare to represent three classes of fare distribution in fare calendar,
we can design a smart airfare categorization using clustering algorithms.
